    TupleTableSlotImpl.Heap.Indexed

    Methods in org.postgresql.pljava.pg that return TupleTableSlotImpl.Heap
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) static TupleTableSlotImpl.Heap
    TupleTableSlotImpl.heapTupleGetLightSlot(TupleDescriptor td, ByteBuffer ht, Lifespan lifespan)
    Allocate a 'light' (no native TupleTableSlot struct) TupleTableSlotImpl.Heap object, given a tuple descriptor and a byte buffer that maps a single-chunk-allocated HeapTuple (one where the HeapTupleHeader directly follows the HeapTupleData) that's to be passed to heap_freetuple when no longer needed.
    (package private) static TupleTableSlotImpl.Heap
    TupleTableSlotImpl.heapTupleGetLightSlot(TupleDescriptor td, ByteBuffer ht, Lifespan lifespan, boolean free)
     
    (package private) static TupleTableSlotImpl.Heap
    TupleTableSlotImpl.heapTupleGetLightSlotNoFree(TupleDescriptor td, long p, Lifespan lifespan)
    Allocate a 'light' (no native TupleTableSlot struct) TupleTableSlotImpl.Heap object, given a tuple descriptor and a pointer to a single-chunk-allocated HeapTuple (one where the HeapTupleHeader directly follows the HeapTupleData) that is not to be freed when no longer needed.
